text.botfather_list:
btcprice - BTC-EUR price
ethprice - ETH-EUR price
price - get price
convert - convert value
alertme - set a reminder
txinfo - get transaction status
help - get help for commands
text.welcome_text:
₿ WELCOME TO CRYPTOBOT ₿

Commands:
/btcprice - BTC-EUR price
/ethprice - ETH-EUR price
/price - ex. /price BTC-USD
/convert - ex /convert BTC EUR
/alertme - ex. /alertme BTC-EUR > 8300
/txinfo - ex. /txinfo hash
/help - ex. /help alertme

BOT developed by Ludovico Pestarino ©
text.help_text:
HELP:
 /btcprice - BTC-EUR price
 /ethprice - ETH-EUR price
 /price - ex. /price BTC-USD
 /convert - ex /convert BTC EUR
 /alertme - ex. /alertme BTC-EUR > 8300
 /txinfo - ex. /txinfo hash
 /help - ex. /help alertme

help./price:
/price Help:

To use /price text the command followed by whatever ticker you want

ex. /price BTC-USD
help./alertme:
/alertme Help:

To use /alertme text the command followed by whatever ticker you want, then you can set greater than [>] or less than [<] price

ex. /alertme BTC-EUR > 8300 (will result in a reminder for bitcoin price reaching a value over 8300€)
help./convert:
/alertme Help:

To use /convert text the command followed by two arguments one for each currency in capital letter (follow coinbase tickers when inserting) then you'll be prompted to select a direction and then your value

ex. /convert BTC EUR (will result in a conversion from BTC to EUR or from EUR to BTC)
help./txinfo:
/txinfo Help:

 To use /txinfo text the command followed by yout transaction hash
